name: Backrooms: The Nightmare
description:
I am very fascinated by the backrooms and the marvellous writers that fills the wiki page with beautiful ideas.

I have made this game prototype to show yoy the potential of a future, more complex game where many interesting levels of the Backrooms can be accessed.

Right now you have:

The Menu Screen

The Backrooms  Level 0: Procedurally generated, over 50.000 Tiles, very huge map, future tweks will involve larger or smaller maps.

The Manila Room: You can find it in the farthest region of the map from where you spawned and is a Wall with distinct Manila Patterns, different from the mono yellow of the other walls.

For now the Manila Room can be accessed only trough No Clipping.

Future Plans:

Water, Food And Fatigue.

Torch, batteries and other gadgets.

Blackout Events.

Level 27 and level 1.

Please consider to donate something so i can buy better assets or get some help, and deliver a wonderful experience.

If you have any suggestion to make the game better, please use the comment section or create a Topic.

Inputs:

WASD for movements.

MouseX and Y for Yaw and Pitch.

Esc To quit the game.

Thanks: Cyber_Glitch.
